This document outlines the results of using optimization and simulated annealing 
on R and C++ versions of `TVVARSS.ml`. The code to conduct these tests is in 
[this file](./initial_testing_files/TVVARSS.ml_testing.R).

```

```


### Using `bobyqa(...)`
